body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        The Inn at the Presidio is located in the historic Bachelors Officers' Quarters building.    Â    Eating There are over a dozen restaurants where you can find food on the grounds of the Presidio. There are many more places to eat nearby in San Francisco.   Sleeping Various lodging options, including youth hostels, motels and hotels are available nearby in San Francisco and southern Marin County. Group camping facilities are available at Rob Hill Campground, and group and walk-in camping is available in the Marin Headlands.
title: Presidio of San Francisco: Eating & Sleeping
